author: Kaylyn Hlavaty
title: DeWine orders flags be flown at half-staff in honor of former Secretary of State Madeleine Albright

sentence: Governor Mike DeWine issued a flag lowering order today directing that all U.S. and Ohio flags be flown at half-staff upon all public buildings and grounds throughout the state.
title: Flags at Half-Staff for Former Secretary of State

author: Stephanie Dube Dwilson
title: Why Are Flags Half-Staff Today? See Proclamations for March 26-27
